subject: Archive plan
description:
**Type:** Task

**Description:** Archive the plan:
- Create folder `inclusive-integration-test-patterns` in `./plans/completed`
- Rename `plans/imperative-toasting-flame.md` to a descriptive name and move to `./plans/completed/inclusive-integration-test-patterns/`
- Read session IDs from the plan file
- For each session ID, move `~/.claude/tasks/<session-id>` to `./plans/completed/inclusive-integration-test-patterns/tasks`
- Update any "in_progress" tasks to "completed"
- Commit changes
- Push all changes to the PR
- Change PR to ready for review
- Set PR to auto merge

**Verification:**
- type: manual-check
- command: `ls plans/completed/inclusive-integration-test-patterns/`
- expected: Plan file and tasks directory exist
